column4: hi all , cant receive video from others but they can see mine in skype.. any help ??
my skype is not working properly...
nits it was not the case few days before
usely what they listed for requirments on there is needed for skype you can go to synaptic package manager under System > Administrator to do such
then it should work fine what type of error you getting
when my fren on other side starts sharing video.. the pop up window just shows white screen..
but other side ppl can see mine properly
yes. ubuntu and skype alwes had a big issue with video sharing its mainly skypes lack of support for ubuntu at this time hopefully its resolved in 10.10
I am in 10.10 only. and it was working fine few days back.. my frens in 10.10 are fine with it
did you install uvc for your camera ? maybe that might help
my camera is working fine.. they can see me
try reinstalling skype it says there is a driver issue and to sometimes fix this is by reinstalling skype
i reinstalled it four to five times
